message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about cooking and the cooking process. To cook a burrito, heat needs to be applied to it in order to warm it up and make it ready to eat. Option (A) is incorrect because removing heat would make the burrito cold. Option (B) is unrelated to the cooking process and does not make logical sense. Option (C) is incorrect because burning the burrito black would render it inedible. Therefore, the correct answer is option (D) - the burrito needs to have heat applied to it.

Option (A) is incorrect because removing heat would cool down the burrito, not cook it. Option (B) is unrelated to cooking a burrito. Option (C) is extreme and would result in a burned burrito, not a properly cooked one.
